item.title: AWS Organizations - Setting Up and Configuring User Accounts
item.description: Setting Up Organizations on AWS Account Granting User Permissions to Access Resources Accessing Cross-Account Resources using AWS CLI Example 1. Creating AWS Accounts Hierarchy under Organization 2. Create Users and Groups in the Root Account 3. Managing Root Account User Permissions in the Child Account 4. Accessing Child Account resources using AWSCLI Setting Up Organizations on AWS Account AWS Orgnizations provides you with an efficient way to better manage and organize your AWS accounts.
